name: One Simple Observation
description:
*Please be patient, it might take a while to load in the browser.*

Story

Play as a human being jumping its way through life. Start as a soul being born, make your first steps as toddler and your first jumps as a child - all the way to adolescence and adulthood. And maybe you'll find a way to get to know who you truly are and why everything's changing in life.

Everythings changing!
  • The overall storyline is about change and how everything's changing in life.
  • The player grows over time - this changes the player parameters several times.
  • The music is changing while you're getting older.
Controls

MOVE ---- A and D

JUMP  ---- Space

Background

Made for the Godot Fire Charity Jam I (2021) within 4 weeks. The theme was "Everythings changing".

Additional Credits:

The beautiful music is made exclusively for the game by Raphael Bauder.

Say Hi! on Twitter or Instagram
